data.title: Grand Duchess Maria Pavlovna of Russia
data.meta_description: Sold for $250 | Daughter of Grand Duke Paul Alexandrovich and Alexandra Georgievna of Greece (1890-1958), whose paternal grandparents were Alexander II and
data.text:
Description

Daughter of Grand Duke Paul Alexandrovich and Alexandra Georgievna of Greece (1890-1958), whose paternal grandparents were Alexander II and Empress Maria Alexandrovna. She was one of only a few Romanov descendants to survive the Russian Revolution. Signed book: The Education of a Princess. Third printing. NY: The Viking Press, 1931. Hardcover, 6.5 x 9.5, 388 pages. Signed on the half-title page in fountain pen, "Grand Duchess Marie." In fine condition.

Auction Info

Auction Title: Fine Autograph and Artifacts, Ft. Hollywood

Dates: #606 - Ended April 14, 2021

This item is Pre-Certified by PSA/DNA
